[quote name="oldjudge" post=2257672]Just a suggestion, but make your life easier and allow for 1887 or 1888 cards.[/QUOTE]

Thanks Jay! Is this supposed to be easy? Hahaha

I pick up what I see when I see it, but am mainly focused on 1889 for a complete team set from that year, with at least one pose from each player. I think I just need those two cards and then maybe, just maybe, I can sleep. :)
